name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In rural Heze, Shandong, people are forced to replace expensive smart card water meters. If they don’t replace them, they will be forced to break the water meters and cut off the water supply
A search on the Internet shows that this problem exists all over the country and has existed for a long time

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 3, CCTV News released a video: Being an enemy of the United States may be dangerous, but being an ally of the United States is deadly.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 3, a fire and explosion occurred on the roof of the Liyuan dormitory building of Hubei Automotive Industry College in Shiyan City. 
Half an hour ago, the school's official statement said that the fire was caused by waterproofing work on the roof, and the fire was extinguished in time, with no casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
My grandfather was an old cadre in the Korean War, and my uncle donated blood for ten years
My feelings about the Blood Trough Sister incident combined with my own experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Shandong woman was insulted by the director of the petition office when she went to petition. She was sentenced to blackmail after receiving compensation of 20,000 yuan.
In early 2019, 32-year-old Li Lu reported that she was sexually assaulted by Shi, her class teacher and mathematics teacher, when she was in the third grade of junior high school at Yangxin County Experimental Middle School in Shandong Province. Shi continued to harass her when she was in high school and college. The Yangxin County Public Security Bureau of Shandong Province stated that because Li Lu's alleged assault was only accused by herself and there was no other evidence, it did not meet the conditions for filing a case.
Since then, Li Lu has had conflicts with Shi many times, during which Li Lu was beaten by Shi. After the public security organs intervened, Li Lu was dissatisfied with the result and filed an administrative lawsuit against the public security organs, which was supported by the court. However, the public security organs have been slow to execute the court's judgment, so Li Lu began to petition.
On July 29, 2022, when Li Lu was petitioning at the Yangxin Petition Bureau, she was insulted by Liu, the director of the Petition Bureau. Li Lu posted the on-site video to the social platform, and Liu was dismissed the next day. Li Lu then asked the Xinyang County Government, the Letters and Calls Bureau, and Liu to compensate for mental damages of 100,000 yuan each, totaling 300,000 yuan.
On August 28, 2022, Liu agreed to compensate 100,000 yuan and transferred 20,000 yuan to Li Lu on the spot. On September 2, 22, Liu reported to the police that he was blackmailed by Li Lu. On September 9, 22, Li Lu was detained for suspected blackmail.
On August 25, 2023, the Yangxin County Court of Shandong sentenced Li Lu to two years and two months in prison for blackmail and infringement of personal information, and a fine of 7,000 yuan. Li Lu appealed.
On November 23, 2023, it was originally the day when the court notified Li Lu of the second trial, but on the eve of the trial, Li Lu's family received a notice that the trial time was postponed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 2, in Sichuan, before dawn, a large number of migrant workers had gathered on the roadside waiting for daily pay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Another kind of nostalgia"
Hupu scored every year in the 21st century, and the scores from 2004 to 2008 were all over 9 points. The score gradually declined from 2011, and the score in 2018 exceeded 9 points again, but from 2019, the score fell sharply, and the score in 2022 was even only 5.2 points.
A netizen replied in the comment area: I look forward to stretching my body, and it is still 2018 outside the window, because life has been getting worse and worse since then.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Douyin issued an announcement on "account real-name information display", requiring the platform to have 500,000 fans and self-media accounts that publish content related to current affairs, society, finance, education, medical care, justice, etc. to authorize the platform to display the verified real-name information on the account homepage.
After clicking the real-name button, the blogger's full name can be seen, but the page cannot be recorded or screenshotted, and the album shows a black screen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shenzhen Health Commission issued a document stating that there are currently 280 million depression patients in the world, and about one-third of them are in China.
